alert.note: Alert for White Pine County (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Chill Advisory issued February 17 at 1:02AM PST until February 17 at 9:00AM PST by NWS Elko
info.description: ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM PST THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Very cold wind chills expected. Wind chills as low as 30 degrees below zero. * WHERE...White Pine County. * WHEN...Until 9 AM PST this morning. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The combination of temperatures below zero along with breezy winds will result in wind chill conditions between 15 degrees below zero and 30 degrees below zero this morning. If being outside is unavoidable, wear appropriate clothing.
info.instruction: Use caution while traveling outside. Wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves. Exposed skin can freeze in as little as 15 to 20 minutes when temperatures are minus 20.
